import "./App.css" import React from "react" import productsData from "./productsData.json" // Import the products data function App() { const shoesProducts = productsData.filter( (product) => product.category === "Shoes" ) const watchesProducts = productsData.filter( (product) => product.category === "Watches" ) return (

ShopCart

Cart

{shoesProducts.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.price}

{product.description}

))}
{watchesProducts.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.price}

{product.description}

))}
) } export default App
